passages.name: Opening Scene
passages.text: You arrive for your first shift at the community coffee shop. [[Greet the team->Meet The Team]] [[Head straight to the counter->Jump In]]

passages.name: Meet The Team
passages.text: The manager introduces you to a mentor barista. [[Shadow the mentor->Shadow Mentor]] [[Ask to lead your own order->Jump In]]

passages.name: Jump In
passages.text: You step behind the counter and the first rush begins. [[Handle the rush->Handle Rush]]

passages.name: Shadow Mentor
passages.text: You observe the mentor guiding customers kindly. [[Handle the rush->Handle Rush]]

passages.name: Handle Rush
passages.text: Orders fly in, but you work together and keep the line moving.
